title: Dr. Suzanne Humphries Threatened With MURDER by Vaccine Troll (Video)
cleaned_text:
You’ve probably already heard about the mass murder “suicide mission” death threat leveled against Dr. Suzanne Humphries by a vaccine troll / propagandist.

If you’re not up to speed on the outlandish, graphic nature of the death threat that resembles the aggressive, demented rants of pro-vaccine propagandists, read this Natural News story for the full details.

Podcast Transcript: “Today, we’re welcoming to our studio here in Austin, Tx, Dr. Suzanne Humphries, who of course recently went public with an incredibly detailed death threat that she received. Some individual out there who is obviously opposed to Dr. Humphries work about the transparency about vaccines and vaccine dangers, threatened to carry out a mass shooting, suicide mission at an autism event to murder our guest today, Dr. Humphries. Dr. Humphries joins us in the studio today to discuss the threats against her life, as well as the potential dangers that vaccines may pose to children and even senior citizens in our society…”
